additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerine, Decyl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate Lauryl Glucoside, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Dehydroxanthan Gum

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: For external use only. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue if local irritation or rash occurs during use. Do not use on broken skin.

description: Dermal Therapy Little Bodies Eczema Body Wash & Shampoo
